headline: XRT Is Up 11% But the Real Story Is Which Retailers Are Winning
summary: The SPDR S&P Retail ETF (NYSEARCA:XRT) tracks the S&P Retail Select Industry Index with equal-weighted exposure across 73 retail holdings spanning apparel, grocery, discount, and specialty retail. Unlike market-cap weighted funds, XRT’s equal-weight structure means smaller retailers carry the same influence as mega-caps like Walmart. XRT has delivered 11.05% returns over the past year, but ... XRT Is Up 11% But the Real Story Is Which Retailers Are Winning

headline: Telsey Advisory Group Maintains Outperform on TJX Companies, Maintains $170 Price Target
summary: Telsey Advisory Group  analyst Dana Telsey   maintains TJX Companies (NYSE:TJX) with a Outperform and maintains $170 price target.
